amendment.description: Amendments en bloc No. 3 consisting of amendments numbered 29, 34, 40, 46, 48, 52, and 54 printed in House Report 111-498.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments nos. 29, 34, 40, 46, 48, 52 and 54 printed in House Report 111-498.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A010) offered by Mr. Andrews.
On agreeing to the Andrews amendments (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
